author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA WEAKENING... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA...
summary: ...LORENA WEAKENING... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 5:00 AM MST Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.1, -113.9 with movement NW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
